abstract: Amazon.com is introducing referral service called Amazon Home Services to help people to get projects and chores done around their homes, many times for products Amazon sells.
lead_paragraph: The system, called Amazon Home Services, is the e-commerce company’s latest attempt to expand its empire beyond online shopping.

headline.main: Amazon Offers Referral Service for Household Projects
headline.print_headline: Amazon Offers Referral Service for Household Projects

snippet: The system, called Amazon Home Services, is the e-commerce company’s latest attempt to expand its empire beyond online shopping.
